II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2019'03'01
187II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2018'08'31 187
wxl 2"113 - 2019 ud¾;= ui 01 jeks isl=rdod - 2019'03'01
^rcfha n,hmsg m%isoaO lrk ,§&
II fldgi – wêlrK
 msgqj  
iïu; jQ mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha oekaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha oekaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï ... 188
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
187 - B 081500 — 353 (2019/03)
D 1 -
   msgqj 
jia;= Nx.;aj kvq ms<sn| oekaùï ... ... ... —
msial,a ud¾I,ajrekaf.a m;a lsÍï ... ... ... —
msial,a úlsKSu ... ... ...  —
nQo,a kvq ms<sn| oekaùï ... ... ... ... —
kS;s wOHdmk iNdfõ oekaùï ... ... ... —
fkd;dßia ,ehsia;= ... ... ... ... —
úúO oekaùï ... ... ... ... 201
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h 
  fuu .eiÜ m;%h www.documents.gov. lk fjí wvúfhka nd.; l< yel' 
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk oekaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs 
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd Èkhka iy fõ,djka 
ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika 
lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a 
ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu 
i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< 
jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr ^tkï" 2019 ud¾;= ui 22  jeks Èk m<lrk 
.eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2019 ud¾;= ui 08 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr& ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
    2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
   zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m<l< hq;= njg 
hï mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh 
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜
 .x.dks ,shkf.a"

ie' hq'-  2019'02'22 Èk m< jQ wxl 2"112 ork .eiÜ m;%fha  I : III fldgi m< fkdùh'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2019'03'01

Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
kqf.af.dv ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh
2016 wxl 12 ork f;dr;=re ±k.ekSfï whs;sjdislï ms<sn| mkf;a 7 jeks j.ka;sfha m%;smdokj,g hg;aj 
1894 wxl 12 ork fkdjákd f,aLk úkdY lsÍfï wd{dmkf;a 5 jeks j.ka;sh m%ldrj lrkq ,nk ksfõokh
fuu wêlrKh bÈßfha wjika ù we;s jir fod<ylg ^12& jvd mer‚ my; Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s kvq jd¾;d 2016 
wxl 12 ork f;dr;=re ±k.ekSfï whs;sjdislï ms<sn| mkf;a 7 jeks j.ka;sfha m%;smdokj,g hg;aj 1894 wxl 12 ork 
fkdjákd f,aLk úkdY lsÍfï wd{dmkf;a 5 jeks j.ka;sfha úêúOdk m%ldrj fuu ±kaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk isg udi 
;=kla ^03& bl=;a ùfuka miqj úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajd isáñ'
Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s kvq jd¾;dj, msgm;a fyda Bg wod< fjk;a f,aLk ,nd .ekSug Wkkaÿjla olajk ;eke;a;ka 
úiska fuu ±kaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk isg udi ;=kla ^03& bl=;a ùug fmr ta i|yd b,a¨ï l< hq;= njg o" lsishï kvq 
jd¾;djla úkdY fkdlrk f,ig b,a,Sula lsÍug wfmalaId lrk hï ;eke;af;l= úiska fuu ±kaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk 
isg udi ;=kla ^03& bl=;a ùug fmr ;ud úiska u fyda kS;s{jrhl= u.ska h:d mßÈ bÈßm;a lrkq ,nk fm;aiula u.ska 
idOdrK fya;= bÈßm;a lsÍug l%shd l< hq;= njg o" jeäÿrg;a ksfõokh lrkq ,efí'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2019'03'01

úúO oekaùï
fld<U § meje;afjk niakdysr m<d;a uydêlrKfha § h
^isú,a wêlrK n,h l%shd;aul lrkq ,nk&
fld<U 03" Ydka; uhsl,a mdr" wxl 18 ork ia:dkfha msysá 
iSudiys; tï' t,a' tï' à' ã' lkaiag%laIka ^C. M. L. - M. T. D. 
Construction Limited& iïnkaO b,a,Suls' 
iy
2007 wxl 07 ork iud.ï mkf;a ^xii& fldgi hgf;a 
wêlrKh úiska wEjr lrkq ,eîu i|yd jQ b,a,Suls'
wxl 372" tA" .%Ekaâmdia mdr" fld<U 14'
''''''''''''''''''''''''''''fm;aiïlrejka'
fld<U 14" .%Ekaâmdia mdr" wxl 372" tA ys zzc,S,a wekaâ ikaiaZZ hk kdufhka yjq,a jHdmdrhla mj;ajdf.k hk fudyuâ 
ysÊðhd¾ wyuâ iyS,a" uyuqâ yÊðhd¾ wyuâ i,audka" wyuâ i,audka fudyuâ biauhs,a iy wyuâ yidka *ia¨kaksiahd 
iyS,a hk whj¨ka úiska fld<U § meje;afjk niakdysr m<d;a uydêlrKh fj; j¾I 2019 la jQ ckjdß ui 21 jk Èk 
by; kï i|yka iSudiys; tï' t,a' tï' à' ã' lkaiag%laIka ^C. M. L - M. T. D. Construction Limited& hk iud.u .Kka 
fírd jid ±óug fm;aiula bÈßm;a lr we;s neõ fufia ±kqï fokq ,efí' ;jo tlS fm;aiu j¾I 2019 uehs ui 07 jk Èk 
wêlrKh yuqfõ úNd.hg .ekSug kshu lr ;sfí' tlS fm;aiu iïnkaOfhka ksfhda.hla lsÍu .ek úfrdaOh olajkakd jQ 
fyda tlÕ;djh olajkakd jQ ljr fyda Khysñfhl= fyda tlS iud.ug odhl jQ wfhl= wef;d;a fuu fm;aiu úNd. lrk 
wjia:dfõ§ mqoa.,slj fyda wêkS;s{jrfhl= fyda kS;s{jrfhl= uÕska tu lghq;a; i|yd fmkS isáh yel' tlS fm;aifï

m;%fha  m< lsÍu i|yd  ksfõok Ndr.kakd wka;su  Èkh o tu i;sfha we;sjk  ksjdvq Èk .Kk wkqj fjkia  jkq  we;'
ta ta .eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd ±kaùï Ndr .kakd wka;su Èkh iy fõ,djka  my; m< lr we;s Wmf,aLkfha ±lafõ'  
my; i|yka  kshñ;  fõ,djg  miq ,efnk  ish¨u ±kaùï th tjQ wh fj; ;emEf,ka  wdmiq tjkq ,efí'  B<Õ .eiÜ m;%fha

o fya;= jk nj i<lkak'
